resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4556</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">September Prayer Service</string>
            <string language="es">Servicio de oraciones de septiembre</string>
            <string language="ga">Seirbhís Urnaí Mheán Fómhair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">September Gebet-Service</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Service de Prière de Septembre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Serviço Do Prayer De Setembro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Servizio Di Preghiera Di Settembre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπηρεσία προσευχής Σεπτεμβρίου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Detailed lesson plan with lots of ideas for beginning of year prayer service, including getting children to compose their own prayers in groups.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección detallado con montones de ideas para empezar el servicio de oraciones del año, también se anima a los niños a que creen sus propias oraciones en grupos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta sonrach le go leor smaointe do sheirbhís urnaí ag tús na bliana, lena n-áirítear na leanaí ag cumadh a bpaidreacha féin i ngrúpaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="es">Religión. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiún</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausführlicher Lektionplan mit Lots Ideen für 
Anfang des Jahrgebetservices, einschließlich das Veranlassen der 
Kinder, ihre eigenen Gebete in den Gruppen zu bestehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan détaillé de leçon avec un bon nombre 
d'idées pour le début du service de prière d'année, y compris 
obliger des enfants à composer leurs propres prières dans les 
groupes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta detalhada da lição com lotes das idéias
para o começo do serviço do prayer do ano, including começar 
crianças compôr seus próprios prayers nos grupos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma dettagliato di lezione con i lotti 
delle idee per inizio del servizio di preghiera di anno, compreso 
convincere i bambini a comporre le loro proprie preghiere nei gruppi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομερές σχέδιο μαθήματος με τα μέρη των ιδεών για 
την αρχή της υπηρεσίας προσευχής έτους, συμπεριλαμβανομένου να 
πάρει τα παιδιά για να συντεθούν οι προσευχές τους κατά ομάδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
